四杀多了就给你开始匹车队，车队四杀就给你匹外挂，真是有够搞笑的，军团扎完三刀的移速在我面前马拉松，再来波核能手电一下晕你一分钟。往死了加强人类，韩服速修车队5分钟不到开大门，屠夫现在谁玩谁高血压，真就是圈钱圈上瘾了呗
Um bom jogo para se divertir com os amigos, apesar dos problemas que existem ainda no jogo. Quando o problema de balanceamento de partidas for resolvido, será um jogo ainda melhor.

O jogo é muito divertido e estratégico. Apesar de ter muita coisa para melhorar ainda, como o balanceamento do matchmaking e aumentar a variedade de cosméticos ao invés de recolorir, a mecânica de combinação das perks torna as partidas inesperadas e imprevisíveis. Isso pode surpreender até os jogadores mais experientes, transformando uma partida derrotada em uma vitória ou vice e versa. Além disso, não preciso nem comentar sobre o conteúdo licenciado para os amantes de filmes de terror e cultura pop, os quais conseguem refletir e preservar em sua maioria suas características próprias com fidelidade.

Un juego muy entrentenido, con infinidades de mecanicanicas dependiendo las perks o habilidades que uses... Un juego para gente sin amigos y para gente con amigos, no discrimina a grupos o a solos, eso suma un monton... despues bueno, la empresa tiene sus detalles, al ser un monopolio en cuanto al genero... se dan el lujo ded no dar mucha pelota a la comunidad, y hacer cosas totalmente inncesarias, pero bueno, sacando la empresa.... el juego es muy completo, muchos personajes diferentes, muchas perks, muchos mapas y sus variantes... nunca es monotono, no te aburre nunca... recomendado.

Buy this game if you want depression

The biggest problem that this game has is that it has absolutely no competition, which leads to confusing statement's and balance decisions. What also lends to bad balance is that all the devs I've seen playing the game are really bad, doesn't matter which role. Survivors have it really easy, they need to hold M1 on gens and Shift+W to run from the killer, while Killers have alot to manage at once, 4 Survivors and their health states, potential totems if hexes are brought, 7 gens, but kill 1 survivor early and have 3 left then the killer will most likely win cause of the insanely bad balancing. One of the biggest mistakes they made was bringing in MMR now everyone tries their hardest to survive and every 2nd killer camps or tunnels which leads to ludicrous amounts of toxicity. Almost no one tries fun builds there are over 100 suvivor perks and 90+ Killer perks but you will most likely see the same 6-7 Surv perks (DH, UB, DS, SC, WoO, CoH, SpC). The killer side isn't much better, in the picked Killer department(Nurse, Spirit, Huntress, Blight), to be honest but I find there to be way more vareity. Playing this game with friends as survivors just screwing around can be really fun, but unless you get baby survivors you will most likely be under constant stress when playing killer. I hope that this game changes once it has competition but I doubt it behaviour is just getting one license after the other to stop players from leaving but that charm will run out eventually....
